data.title: DAPP Development
data.description: A decentralized application (dapp) is an application built on a decentralized network that combines a smart contract and a frontend user interface.

data.title: Web 3.0 Development
data.description: Web 3.0 is the third generation of Internet services that will focus on understanding and analyzing data to provide a semantic web.

data.title: Project Audit
data.description: A Project Audit is a formal review of a project, which is intended to assess the extent up to which project management standards are being upheld.

data.title: Hacking / RE
data.description: A security hacker is someone who explores methods for breaching defenses and exploiting weaknesses in a computer system or network.

data.title: Bot/Script Development
data.description: Bot development frameworks were created as advanced software tools that eliminate a large amount of manual work and accelerate the development process.
